name: PRIN-STOA-LHC
body:
**PROGRAMMI DI RICERCA SCIENTIFICA DI RILEVANTE INTERESSE NAZIONALE**

**(contract 20108T4XTM)** 

_Development of computing technologies for the optimisation of access to LHC data and for the technology transfer towards other research areas using the grid and cloud computing approach._

**This is a single entry point to the available documentation on the new developments within the project. Please link here your github repository wiki or any other source of documentation you would like to share.**

### VIRTUAL STORAGE ELEMENT (VSE)
[Setup the Virtual Storage Element](https://github.com/PRIN-STOA-LHC/VirtualStorageElement/wiki/Setup-the-Virtual-Storage-Element) 

**Mailto:** svallero@to.infn.it
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
